name: Farbe
description:
Gameplay:

You can change your color, and depending on the color you can pass through certain obstacles.

Controls:

Move with: arrowkeys or wasd

Change To Grey: C/L

Change To Red: Z/J

Change To Blue: X/K

Story:

You play as Farbe, a mage-apprentice. His teacher, Rouge, has gone to get some milk. But when a spell goes wrong Farbe has to flee the wizard tower!
